page.title: 06A BOYS GAME IN THURSTON
page.content:
BULLDOG---OR BRITISH BULLDOG
Bulldog is a boys' game. Someone is Â£it' in the middle. He calls someone's name and that person has to try to cross to the other side of the playground without being caught. If he gets across, then everyone else tries to get across. If anyone is caught,he helps Â£it' to catch some more people, until only one person is left. If Â£it' shouts BULLDOG they all run across, and if someone is caught while the others are still running, he might be given a fright! In some cases, the person caught has to be lifted off the ground before he is properly caught.
